verses.verse: It happened in the fourth<WH7243> year<WH8141> of Jehoiakim<WH3079> the son<WH1121> of Josiah,<WH2977> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> that this word<WH1697> came to Jeremiah<WH3414> from Yahweh,<WH3068> saying,<WH559>

Take<WH3947> a scroll<WH4039> of a book,<WH5612> and write<WH3789> therein all the words<WH1697> that I have spoken<WH1696> to you against Israel,<WH3478> and against Judah,<WH3063> and against all the nations,<WH1471> from the day<WH3117> I spoke<WH1696> to you,<WH3117> from the days of Josiah,<WH2977> even to this day.<WH3117>

It may be that the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> will hear<WH8085> all the evil<WH7451> which I purpose<WH2803> to do<WH6213> to them;<WH7725> that they may return every man<WH376> from his evil<WH7451> way;<WH1870> that I may forgive<WH5545> their iniquity<WH5771> and their sin.<WH2403>

Then Jeremiah<WH3414> called<WH7121> Baruch<WH1263> the son<WH1121> of Neriah;<WH5374> and Baruch<WH1263> wrote<WH3789> from the mouth<WH6310> of Jeremiah<WH3414> all the words<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> which he had spoken<WH1696> to him,<WH4039> on a scroll of a book.<WH5612>
Jeremiah<WH3414> commanded<WH6680> Baruch,<WH1263> saying,<WH559> I am shut up;<WH6113> I can't<WH3201> go<WH935> into the house<WH1004> of Yahweh:<WH3068>

therefore you go,<WH935> and read<WH7121> in the scroll,<WH4039> which you have written<WH3789> from my mouth,<WH6310> the words<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> in the ears<WH241> of the people<WH5971> in Yahweh<WH3068>'s house<WH1004> on the fast<WH6685> day;<WH3117> and also you shall read<WH7121> them in the ears<WH241> of all Judah<WH3063> who come out<WH935> of their cities.<WH5892>

It may be they will present<WH5307> their supplication<WH8467> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> and will return<WH7725> everyone<WH376> from his evil<WH7451> way;<WH1870> for great<WH1419> is the anger<WH639> and the wrath<WH2534> that Yahweh<WH3068> has pronounced<WH1696> against this people.<WH5971>

Baruch<WH1263> the son<WH1121> of Neriah<WH5374> did<WH6213> according to all that Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030> commanded<WH6680> him,<WH7121> reading in the book<WH5612> the words<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> in Yahweh<WH3068>'s house.<WH1004>

Now it happened in the fifth<WH2549> year<WH8141> of Jehoiakim<WH3079> the son<WH1121> of Josiah,<WH2977> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> in the ninth<WH8671> month,<WH2320> that all the people<WH5971> in Jerusalem,<WH3389> and all the people<WH5971> who came<WH935> from the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063> to Jerusalem,<WH3389> proclaimed<WH7121> a fast<WH6685> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>

Then read<WH7121> Baruch<WH1263> in the book<WH5612> the words<WH1697> of Jeremiah<WH3414> in the house<WH1004> of Yahweh,<WH3068> in the room<WH3957> of Gemariah<WH1587> the son<WH1121> of Shaphan,<WH8227> the scribe,<WH5608> in the upper<WH5945> court,<WH2691> at the entry<WH6607> of the new<WH2319> gate<WH8179> of Yahweh<WH3068>'s house,<WH1004> in the ears<WH241> of all the people.<WH5971>
When Micaiah<WH4321> the son<WH1121> of Gemariah,<WH1587> the son<WH1121> of Shaphan,<WH8227> had heard<WH8085> out of the book<WH5612> all the words<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068>

he went down<WH3381> into the king<WH4428>'s house,<WH1004> into the scribe<WH5608>'s room:<WH3957> and behold,<WH8269> all the princes were sitting<WH3427> there,<WH476> Elishama the scribe,<WH5608> and Delaiah<WH1806> the son<WH1121> of Shemaiah,<WH8098> and Elnathan<WH494> the son<WH1121> of Achbor,<WH5907> and Gemariah<WH1587> the son<WH1121> of Shaphan,<WH8227> and Zedekiah<WH6667> the son<WH1121> of Hananiah,<WH2608> and all the princes.<WH8269>
Then Micaiah<WH4321> declared<WH5046> to them all the words<WH1697> that he had heard,<WH8085> when Baruch<WH1263> read<WH7121> the book<WH5612> in the ears<WH241> of the people.<WH5971>

Therefore all the princes<WH8269> sent<WH7971> Jehudi<WH3065> the son<WH1121> of Nethaniah,<WH5418> the son<WH1121> of Shelemiah,<WH8018> the son<WH1121> of Cushi,<WH3570> to Baruch,<WH1263> saying,<WH559> Take<WH3947> in your hand<WH3027> the scroll<WH4039> in which you have read<WH7121> in the ears<WH241> of the people,<WH5971> and come.<WH3212> So Baruch<WH1263> the son<WH1121> of Neriah<WH5374> took<WH3947> the scroll<WH4039> in his hand,<WH3027> and came to them.<WH935>
They said<WH559> to him,<WH3427> Sit down now,<WH7121> and read it in our ears.<WH241> So Baruch<WH1263> read<WH7121> it in their ears.<WH241>

Now it happened,<WH8085> when they had heard all the words,<WH1697> they turned in fear<WH6342> one<WH376> toward<WH413> another,<WH7453> and said<WH559> to Baruch,<WH1263> We will surely<WH5046> tell<WH5046> the king<WH4428> of all these words.<WH1697>
They asked<WH7592> Baruch,<WH1263> saying,<WH559> Tell<WH5046> us now,<WH3789> How did you write all these words<WH1697> at his mouth?<WH6310>
Then Baruch<WH1263> answered<WH559> them,<WH7121> He pronounced all these words<WH1697> to me with his mouth,<WH6310> and I wrote<WH3789> them with ink<WH1773> in the book.<WH5612>
Then the princes<WH8269> said<WH559> to Baruch,<WH1263> Go,<WH3212> hide,<WH5641> you and Jeremiah;<WH3414> and let no man<WH376> know<WH3045> where you are.<WH375>

They went in<WH935> to the king<WH4428> into the court;<WH2691> but they had laid up<WH6485> the scroll<WH4039> in the room<WH3957> of Elishama<WH476> the scribe;<WH5608> and they told<WH5046> all the words<WH1697> in the ears<WH241> of the king.<WH4428>

So the king<WH4428> sent<WH7971> Jehudi<WH3065> to get<WH3947> the scroll;<WH4039> and he took<WH3947> it out of the room<WH3957> of Elishama<WH476> the scribe.<WH5608> Jehudi<WH3065> read<WH7121> it in the ears<WH241> of the king,<WH4428> and in the ears<WH241> of all the princes<WH8269> who stood<WH5975> beside<WH5921> the king.<WH4428>
Now the king<WH4428> was sitting<WH3427> in the winter house<WH1004> in the ninth<WH8671> month:<WH2320> and there was a fire in the brazier<WH254> burning<WH1197> before him.<WH6440>

It happened,<WH3065> when Jehudi had read<WH7121> three<WH7969> or four<WH702> leaves,<WH1817> that the king cut<WH7167> it with the penknife,<WH8593> and cast<WH7993> it into the fire<WH784> that was in the brazier,<WH254> until all the scroll<WH4039> was consumed<WH8552> in the fire<WH784> that was in the brazier.<WH254>
They were not afraid,<WH6342> nor tore<WH7167> their garments,<WH899> neither the king,<WH4428> nor any of his servants<WH5650> who heard<WH8085> all these words.<WH1697>

Moreover Elnathan<WH494> and Delaiah<WH1806> and Gemariah<WH1587> had made intercession<WH6293> to the king<WH4428> that he would not burn<WH8313> the scroll;<WH4039> but he would not hear them.<WH8085>

The king<WH4428> commanded<WH6680> Jerahmeel<WH3396> the king<WH4428>'s son,<WH1121> and Seraiah<WH8304> the son<WH1121> of Azriel,<WH5837> and Shelemiah<WH8018> the son<WH1121> of Abdeel,<WH5655> to take<WH3947> Baruch<WH1263> the scribe<WH5608> and Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet;<WH5030> but Yahweh<WH3068> hid them.<WH5641>

Then the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to Jeremiah,<WH3414> after<WH310> that the king<WH4428> had burned<WH8313> the scroll,<WH4039> and the words<WH1697> which Baruch<WH1263> wrote<WH3789> at the mouth<WH6310> of Jeremiah,<WH3414> saying,<WH559>

Take<WH3947> again<WH7725> another<WH312> scroll,<WH4039> and write<WH3789> in it all the former<WH7223> words<WH1697> that were in the first<WH7223> scroll,<WH4039> which Jehoiakim<WH3079> the king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063> has burned.<WH8313>

Concerning Jehoiakim<WH3079> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063> you shall say,<WH559> Thus says<WH559> Yahweh:<WH3068> You have burned<WH8313> this scroll,<WH4039> saying,<WH559> Why have you written<WH3789> therein,<WH559> saying, The king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> shall certainly<WH935> come<WH935> and destroy<WH7843> this land,<WH776> and shall cause to cease<WH7673> from there man<WH120> and animal?<WH929>

Therefore thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> concerning Jehoiakim<WH3079> king<WH4428> of Judah:<WH3063> He shall have none to sit<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> of David;<WH1732> and his dead body<WH5038> shall be cast out<WH7993> in the day<WH3117> to the heat,<WH2721> and in the night<WH3915> to the frost.<WH7140>

I will punish<WH6485> him and his seed<WH2233> and his servants<WH5650> for their iniquity;<WH5771> and I will bring<WH935> on them,<WH3427> and on the inhabitants of Jerusalem,<WH3389> and on the men<WH376> of Judah,<WH3063> all the evil<WH7451> that I have pronounced<WH1696> against them,<WH8085> but they didn't listen.

Then took<WH3947> Jeremiah<WH3414> another<WH312> scroll,<WH4039> and gave<WH5414> it to Baruch<WH1263> the scribe,<WH5608> the son<WH1121> of Neriah,<WH5374> who wrote<WH3789> therein from the mouth<WH6310> of Jeremiah<WH3414> all the words<WH1697> of the book<WH5612> which Jehoiakim<WH3079> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063> had burned<WH8313> in the fire;<WH784> and there were added<WH3254> besides to them many<WH7227> like<WH1992> words.<WH1697>
